Class Roster

java.lang.Object
Roster
public class Roster
extends java.lang.Object
This class performs actions like add, remove, printing, setting study abroad status, and calculating tuition & financial aid on the roster.
Author:
Bhavya Patel, Samuel Asher Kappala

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Student[] rosterList  
    private int size

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean add​(Student student)
    This method adds a student to the roster array list.
    int calculateFinancialAid​(java.lang.String name, Major major, double financialAid)
    A method to calculate and update the financial aid and tuition of a resident student
    void calculateTuition()
    A method to calculate the tuition of all the students in the roster list
    private int find​(Student student)
    A private method that searches for a student the roster array list and returns the index.
    private void grow()
    This method grows the size of the roster array list by 4 every time its capacity is full.
    int payTuition​(java.lang.String name, Major major, double fees, Date paymentDate)
    A method that updates the tuition due of a student when the fees is payed
    void print()
    A method that prints out the roster list
    void printByPaymentDate()
    A method that prints out the roster list ordered by payment date.
    void printByStudentName()
    A method that prints out the roster list ordered by student name

    This method removes a student from the roster array list
    int setStudyAbroadStatus​(java.lang.String name, Major major, boolean studyAbroadStatus)
    A method that sets the study abroad status of an international student

  • Method Details

    • find

      private int find​(Student student)
      A private method that searches for a student the roster array list and returns the index.
      Parameters:
      student -
      Returns:
      index of the student, -1 if student does not exist.

    • grow

      private void grow()
      This method grows the size of the roster array list by 4 every time its capacity is full.

    • add

      public boolean add​(Student student)
      This method adds a student to the roster array list.
      Parameters:
      student -
      Returns:
      true if student is added, false if student already exists

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(Student student)
      This method removes a student from the roster array list
      Parameters:
      student -
      Returns:
      true is student is removed, false if student doesnt exist/not removed

    • print

      public void print()
      A method that prints out the roster list

    • printByStudentName

      public void printByStudentName()
      A method that prints out the roster list ordered by student name

    • printByPaymentDate

      public void printByPaymentDate()
      A method that prints out the roster list ordered by payment date. Students who did not make at least one payment will not be displayed.

    • calculateTuition

      public void calculateTuition()
      A method to calculate the tuition of all the students in the roster list

    • payTuition

      public int payTuition​(java.lang.String name, Major major, double fees, Date paymentDate)
      A method that updates the tuition due of a student when the fees is payed
      Parameters:
      name -
      major -
      fees -
      paymentDate -
      Returns:
      1 if the fees exceeds tuition due, 0 if the fees is payed and tuition is updated, -1 if the student doesnt exist

    • setStudyAbroadStatus

      public int setStudyAbroadStatus​(java.lang.String name, Major major, boolean studyAbroadStatus)
      A method that sets the study abroad status of an international student
      Parameters:
      name -
      major -
      studyAbroadStatus -
      Returns:
      1 if the study abroad status is succesfully changed, 0 if the study abroad status is the same as the one that already exists, -1 if the study abroad status is not changed/Student is not an itnernational student/Student not found

    • calculateFinancialAid

      public int calculateFinancialAid​(java.lang.String name, Major major, double financialAid)
      A method to calculate and update the financial aid and tuition of a resident student
      Parameters:
      name -
      major -
      financialAid -
      Returns:
      2 if the financial aid is awarded, 1 if financial aid has already been awarded, 0 if the student is part time, -1 if the student is not a resident student, -2 if the student is not in the roster
